sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState,useRef} from 'react' import '../styles/BookingSummary.css' import flightContent from "../context/FlightContext"; import '../styles/BookingSummary.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const BookingSummary = () => { const host = "http://localhost:4000" const content = useContext(flightContent) const {tripValue, settripValue,tripFlights,selectedflight, adultCounter, childCounter,infantCounter ,passCount,localpassengers,departDate, returnDate, passengersinfo, setPassengersinfo,setSelectedflight,contactinfo, setContactinfo} = content useEffect(() => { setSelectedflight(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('selectedflight'))) setPassengersinfo(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('passengersinfo'))) setContactinfo([JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('contactinfo'))]) }, []) const btn = useRef() const navigate = useNavigate() const [isBackButtonClicked, setIsBackButtonClicked] = useState(false) const onBackButtonEvent = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if(!isBackButtonClicked){ btn.current.click(); } } useEffect(() => { window.history.pushState(null, null, window.location.pathname); window.addEventListener('popstate', onBackButtonEvent); }); const bookandpay= async () => { // const totalprice = tripFlights[0].economyprice+tripFlights[1].economyprice console.log(tripFlights) const response = await fetch(`${host}/api/v1/wuflights`,{ method:'POST', headers:{ 'Content-type':'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ totalprice: tripFlights[0].economyprice+tripFlights[1].economyprice, flightname:tripFlights[0].flightname, flightnumber:tripFlights[0].flightnumber, departure:tripFlights[0].departure, departuretime:tripFlights[0].departuretime, departureairport:tripFlights[0].departureairport, departurecode:tripFlights[0].departurecode, destination:tripFlights[0].destination, destinationtime:tripFlights[0].destinationtime, destinationairport:tripFlights[0].destinationairport, destinationcode:tripFlights[0].destinationcode, rflightname:tripFlights[1].flightname, rflightnumber:tripFlights[1].flightnumber, rdeparture:tripFlights[1].departure, rdeparturetime:tripFlights[1].departuretime, rdepartureairport:tripFlights[1].departureairport, rdeparturecode:tripFlights[1].departurecode, rdestination:tripFlights[1].destination, rdestinationtime:tripFlights[1].destinationtime, rdestinationairport:tripFlights[1].destinationairport, rdestinationcode:tripFlights[1].destinationcode }) }) const booked = await response.json() } return (
Trip Summary
{/*
Trip summary
*/}
{selectedflight.map((flight)=>{ return
Outbound flight
{flight.departure}
→
{flight.destination}
{departDate}
Departure
Arrival
Operated by
Class
{flight.departuretime+' '+flight.departurecode}
{flight.destinationtime+' '+flight.destinationcode}
{flight.flightname}
Economy
{flight.departure+', '+flight.departureairport}
Non-stop
{flight.destination+', '+flight.destinationairport}
})}
Passenger Details
Passenger name
Passport
Date of birth
Type
{passengersinfo.map((element)=>{ const {firstname,lastname,passport,type} = element return <>
{firstname.replace(firstname.charAt(0), firstname.charAt(0).toUpperCase())+' '+lastname.replace(lastname.charAt(0), lastname.charAt(0).toUpperCase())}
{passport?passport:'-'}
-
{type}
})}
Contact Details
Passenger name
Type
Email
Number
{contactinfo.map((element)=>{ const { mobilenumber, email} = element return <> {/*
{firstname.replace(firstname.charAt(0), firstname.charAt(0).toUpperCase())+' '+lastname.replace(lastname.charAt(0), lastname.charAt(0).toUpperCase())}
*/}
Primary
Primary
{email}
{mobilenumber}
})}
Total price
Trip price
INR {selectedflight.map((element)=> { const{economyprice, premiuemprice}= element return economyprice })*(passCount-infantCounter)}
({adultCounter?<>{adultCounter} Adult:''}{childCounter?<>+{childCounter}Child:''}{infantCounter?<>+{infantCounter}Infant:''})
Payable Amount:
INR {selectedflight.map((element)=> { const{economyprice, premiuemprice}= element return economyprice })*(passCount-infantCounter)}
Modal title
...
) } export default BookingSummary
